property.name: name_key
property.value: Mashing Time

property.name: description_key
property.value: Learn how to brew cheap beer. We start off by making some Mash. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Learn how to brew cheap beer. We start off by making some Mash. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: name_key
property.value: All About Wort

property.name: description_key
property.value: After the Mash we need to boil up some Wort. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: After the Mash we need to boil up some Wort. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Primary Fermentation

property.name: description_key
property.value: Now we take our Wort and let it ferment into our Raw Beer. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Now we take our Wort and let it ferment into our Raw Beer. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Bottle Time

property.name: description_key
property.value: Raw Beer needs to be bottled before you can drink it. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Raw Beer needs to be bottled before you can drink it. You must have both: Brew Cooker and Brew Station. Required tools: Masher, Boiler, Carboy, and Bottle Capper.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Mysterious Mesquite

property.name: description_key
property.value: Mesquite seems mysterious at first, where do you find it? In the desert biome search for the driftwood. Smash one up with an axe and you will get some Mesquite Woodchips.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Mesquite seems mysterious at first, where do you find it? In the desert biome search for the driftwood. Smash one up with an axe and you will get some Mesquite Woodchips.

property.name: name_key
property.value: Farming Tools

property.name: group_name_key
property.value: Farming Crops

property.name: description_key
property.value: Learn how to plant crops and then receive Farm Life crop seeds. Farming requires farm plots. Once you recieve the Crop Seeds Crate, place it on the ground and destroy with an AXE.

property.name: offer_key
property.value: Learn how to plant crops and then receive Farm Life crop seeds. Farming requires farm plots. Once you recieve the Crop Seeds Crate, place it on the ground and destroy with an AXE.

property.value: Making Seeds

property.value: Farming Crops

property.value: Farming Crops

property.name: name_key
property.value: Harvesting Seeds

property.name: group_name_key
property.value: Growing Trees

property.name: description_key
property.value: Learn how to grow trees and then receive Farm Life trees seeds. Harvesting seeds is essential to expanding your groves. (Note: Must be in a forest biome for this quest.). Once you recieve the Tree Seeds Crate, place it on the ground and destroy with an axe.
